source.sqlReaderQuery:
select substring(dbo.udf_covert_utc_to_local_Datetime(getdate()), 1,4)  as  currentyear
	,substring(dbo.udf_covert_utc_to_local_Datetime(getdate()),6,2)  as  currentmonth
	,substring(dbo.udf_covert_utc_to_local_Datetime(getdate()),9,2)  as  currentdayofmonth
	,substring(dbo.udf_covert_utc_to_local_Datetime(dateadd(DAY,-1,getdate())), 1,4)  as  yesterdayyear
	,substring(dbo.udf_covert_utc_to_local_Datetime(dateadd(DAY,-1,getdate())),6,2)  as  yesterdaymonth
	,substring(dbo.udf_covert_utc_to_local_Datetime(dateadd(DAY,-1,getdate())),9,2)  as  yesterdaydayofmonth

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select 
		ss.*, STD.TableID
 From 
 (

	 SELECT 
		sourceid, Fileserverlocation, FileFolderPath,value as STATION_POINT_NAME
	FROM  ETL.SourceSystem 
		cross apply STRING_SPLIT(filefoldername, ',')
	where sourceid = @{pipeline().parameters.SourceID}

) SS join  [ETL].[SourceTableDetails] STD on STD.sourceid = ss.sourceid
and TargetBlobFileName = ss.STATION_POINT_NAME

Select 
		ss.*, STD.TableID,STD.skipcsvrows,  TargetBlobFileName as STATION_POINT_NAME,   cyear, cmonth, cday
From 
 (	
 select substring(dbo.udf_covert_utc_to_local_Datetime(getdate()), 1,4)  as  cyear
	,substring(dbo.udf_covert_utc_to_local_Datetime(getdate()),6,2)  as  cmonth
	,substring(dbo.udf_covert_utc_to_local_Datetime(getdate()),9,2)  as  cday
union
select
	substring(dbo.udf_covert_utc_to_local_Datetime(dateadd(DAY,-1,getdate())), 1,4)  as  yesterdayyear
	,substring(dbo.udf_covert_utc_to_local_Datetime(dateadd(month,-1,getdate())),6,2)  as  yesterdaymonth
	,substring(dbo.udf_covert_utc_to_local_Datetime(dateadd(DAY,-1,getdate())),9,2)  as  yesterdaydayofmonth
	
) as ft  cross apply ETL.SourceSystem SS 

join  [ETL].[SourceTableDetails] STD on STD.sourceid = ss.sourceid
and isActive =1
where STD.sourceid =   @{pipeline().parameters.SourceID}

activities.name: For Station Point Name cross dates

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select Station_Number from  [ETL].[SourceTableDetails] STD join  ETL.SourceSystem ss on STD.sourceid = ss.sourceid join bom.station on TargetBlobFileName = station.BOM_Folder_Name
where TableID = '@{pipeline().parameters.TableID}'

value.value: @if(equals(substring(activity('BOM Daily Rainfall Weather').output.Response, add(indexOf(activity('BOM Daily Rainfall Weather').output.Response,pipeline().parameters.blobfile),18),4),'BLIC'),pipeline().parameters.year,substring(activity('BOM Daily Rainfall Weather').output.Response,add(indexOf(activity('BOM Daily Rainfall Weather').output.Response,pipeline().parameters.blobfile),18),4))

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT TOP 1 Display_Name 
FROM BOM.Station s  
join [ETL].[SourceTableDetails] STD 
on  s.Station_Number =  SUBSTRING (SourceTableName, charindex('_',SourceTableName,1)+1 ,6)
join  ETL.SourceSystem ss 
on STD.SourceID = ss.SourceID 
where 1=1
and  TableID = '@{pipeline().parameters.TableID}'

SELECT [ParameterValue],
dbo.udf_covert_utc_to_local_Datetime(getdate()) as  localstarttime2
  FROM [ETL].[SourceTableParameter]
  WHERE IsActive = 1
  AND ParameterName = 'URL_Folder_Data'
  AND [TableID] = '@{pipeline().parameters.TableID}'

properties.description: Transfer file to Archive folder in global scape

sqlReaderQuery.value:
Select  

     FileFolderName 
	 ,SourceFileName
    ,ArchiveFileFolderName =FileFolderName  + '\Archive\' + convert(varchar(20),dbo.udf_getLocalDTM(),112)
	,CheckpointColumn
	,CheckpointColumnValue
	,AzuresqlTargetTableName
from etl.sourcesystem s
LEFT OUTER JOIN ETL.SourceTableDetails d ON s.sourceid = d.sourceid 
LEFT OUTER JOIN ETL.SourceFileLoad SFL on replace(SFL.FileName,'.csv','') = d.SourceTableName
where sourcename = '@{pipeline().parameters.SourceName}'  and d.isactive = 1
and d.TriggerName like concat('%','@{pipeline().parameters.TriggerName}','%')

activities.description: ForEach activity to get the partition list from Lookup activity and then iterate each of them to Copy activity.

ErrorMessage.value: @concat(item().SourceFileName,' was not received with latest ',item().CheckpointColumn, '. The current ', item().CheckpointColumn, ' is ',item().CheckpointColumnValue)

properties.description: Transfer file to Blob storage

sqlReaderQuery.value:
Select  FileFolderName,SourceFileName,TargetBlobFilePath,TargetBlobFileName = lower(TargetBlobFileName + '_' + convert(varchar(20),dbo.udf_getLocalDTM(),112) + targetBlobFileNameExt )
from etl.sourcesystem s
LEFT OUTER JOIN ETL.SourceTableDetails d
ON s.sourceid = d.sourceid 
and d.isactive = 1
where sourcename = '@{pipeline().parameters.sourcename}'
and d.TriggerName like concat('%','@{pipeline().parameters.TriggerName}','%')

sqlReaderQuery.value:
Select 
s.sourceID,
tableID, 
SourceLandingContainer,
concat(LOWER(SourceSchemaName),'-datalanding/',SourceTableName) as SourceFilePath,
TargetBlobContainer,
TargetBlobFilePath,
TargetBlobFileName = lower(TargetBlobFileName + '_' + cast(SYSDATETIME() as varchar(100))+ targetBlobFileNameExt ),
ColumnDelimiter,QuoteCharacter
from etl.sourcesystem s
LEFT OUTER JOIN ETL.SourceTableDetails d
ON s.sourceid = d.sourceid 
and d.isactive = 1
where s.sourceid='@{pipeline().parameters.sourceid}'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('select distinct 
CASE 
         WHEN a.SourceFileName LIKE ''%.%'' THEN SUBSTRING(a.SourceFileName, 1, Charindex(''.'', a.SourceFileName) - 1) 
         ELSE a.SourceFileName
       END AS ConfigSourceFileName 
,
CASE 
         WHEN a.SourceFileName LIKE ''%.%'' THEN RIGHT(a.SourceFileName, Len(a.SourceFileName) - 
                                                       Charindex(''.'', a.SourceFileName)) 
         ELSE a.SourceFileName
       END AS ConfigSourceFileNameExt 
, b.SourceName, a.SourceFileName AS ConfigSourceFileNameWithExt, b.SourceLandingContainer, b.FileFolderName from etl.SourceTableDetails a 
INNER JOIN etl.SourceSystem b ON a.SourceId = b.SourceId 
where a.IsActive = 1 and a.SourceId = ', pipeline().parameters.SourceID)

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('select distinct 
CASE 
         WHEN a.SourceFileName LIKE ''%.%'' THEN SUBSTRING(a.SourceFileName, 1, Charindex(''.'', a.SourceFileName) - 1) 
         ELSE a.SourceFileName
       END AS ConfigSourceFileName 
,
CASE 
         WHEN a.SourceFileName LIKE ''%.%'' THEN RIGHT(a.SourceFileName, Len(a.SourceFileName) - 
                                                       Charindex(''.'', a.SourceFileName)) 
         ELSE a.SourceFileName
       END AS ConfigSourceFileNameExt 
, b.SourceName, a.SourceFileName AS ConfigSourceFileNameWithExt, b.SourceLandingContainer, b.FileFolderName from etl.SourceTableDetails a 
INNER JOIN etl.SourceSystem b ON a.SourceId = b.SourceId 
where a.IsActive = 1 and a.SourceId = ', pipeline().parameters.SourceID)

sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('DECLARE @ObjectName VARCHAR(120), @SchemaName VARCHAR(100), @TableName VARCHAR(100) SELECT @ObjectName = ''', item().AzuresqlTempDeleteTableName, ''' SELECT @TableName = PARSENAME(@ObjectName, 1), @SchemaName = PARSENAME(@ObjectName, 2) IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = @TableName and Table_Schema = @SchemaName) BEGIN Truncate Table ',  item().AzuresqlTempDeleteTableName, ' SELECT COUNT(*) AS RecCount FROM ', item().AzuresqlTempDeleteTableName, ' END ELSE BEGIN SELECT 0  AS RecCount END ')

SELECT
  srcSys.SourceID
FROM ETL.SourceSystem srcSys
WHERE srcSys.SourceName = '@{pipeline().parameters.SourceName}'

dependsOn.activity: Copy MSFPackages table from EA to EDW Discovery

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select distinct case when MSFPackages.[Status] in (1,0) then 'SUCCESS' else 'FAIL' end
from	ETL.SourceSystem SS join ETL.SourceTableDetails STD on SS.SourceID = STD.SourceID 
		join [Ellipse9].[MSFPackages] MSFPackages on lower(MSFPackages.sourcetablename) = STD.SourceTableName
where	SS.sourcename = 'Ellipse9'
		and MSFPackages.[Status] not in (1,0) and cast(MSFPackages.StartTime as date) = cast([dbo].[udf_getLocalDTM]() as date)

activities.name: Copy MSFPackages table from EA to EDW Discovery

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select 
'NA' as ROW_NATURAL_KEY,
'NA' as ROW_SOURCE,
'NA' as ROW_HASH_KEY,
'NA' as ROW_EXECUTION_ID,
cast ('1900-01-01' as datetime) as ROW_CREATED_DTM,
cast ('1900-01-01' as datetime) as ROW_LAST_MODIFIED_DTM,
'NA' as ROW_ACTION_TYPE,
PackageName,
ProjectName,
DefaultRunTime,
AvgRunTime,
Enabled,
Status,
EXECID,
StartTime,
EndTime,
TotalSecs,
OverrideEnabled,
LastModDate,
IsEllipseTable,
IsDeltaLoad,
SourceTableName,
PrimaryFields,
TargetTable,
IsDeltaDefault,
LastGoodLoadDate,
CIOTable,
ErrorDesc,
Derived,
HostRowCount,
HostRowCountSQL
from dbo.MSFPackages

sqlReaderQuery.value: select cast(max(DataId) as nvarchar(100)) as MaxSequenceNumber from [Evoqua].[Replication_Data]

from [ETL].[SourceTableDetails] 
where SourceID = '@{activity('Get Source details').output.firstRow.SourceId}' and IsActive = 1

select FileFolderName, [FileName] TargetFileName, LastLoadedDate,CheckpointColumn,CheckpointColumnDatatype,CheckpointColumnValue

activities.name: Fetch Last Refresh DateTime for INC Load

ifTrueActivities.name: lkp_getpreviousdatevalue
ifTrueActivities.description: Retrieve  the last high-watermark value stored in external control table

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select isnull(@{pipeline().parameters.Control_Table_Column_Name},'1753-01-01') as WatermarkValue from @{pipeline().parameters.Control_Table_Table_Name}
where TableID = @{pipeline().parameters.TableID}

ifTrueActivities.name: lkp_getcurrentmaxvalue
ifTrueActivities.description: Retrieve  the current maximum value in watermark column of source data store

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT  
	 Case WHEN [__$operation] = 1 THEN 'DELETE'
	        WHEN [__$operation] = 2 THEN 'INSERT'
			WHEN [__$operation] = 4 THEN ' UPDATE' END as ROW_OPERATION
    ,@{pipeline().parameters.Source_Column_List}
  FROM @{concat('cdc.',pipeline().parameters.DeltaTargetTableName,'_CT',' ',  pipeline().parameters.Data_Destination_File_Name)}
  WHERE [__$operation] !=3

activities.name: Get List of Columns for Date Transformation

sqlReaderQuery.value:
Select SDTD.TableID 
		,SDTD.SourceColumn
		,STD.targetblobfilename
		,STD.targetblobcontainer 
		,case when SS.sourcename = 'Daptiv' then 'Daptiv/' + STD.targetblobfilename else STD.targetblobfilename end as targetblobfilefolder 
		,replace(STD.targetblobfilepath,'/transformed','') as targetblobfilefolderpath
		,STD.ColumnDelimiter
		,STD.QuoteCharacter
		,replace(STD.targetblobfilepath,'/transformed','') as blobfilename /* Keeping the blobfile name as targetblobcontainer. The actual filename gets appended to it at execute notebook - ETL_Change_DateFormat step in the 
		PL_Framework_TRFM_TransformDateForEachtable pipeline*/
		,STD.sourcecolumnlist
		,STD.storageaccount
		,SS.databricksclusterid
		,SS.databrickssecretname
From ETL.sourcesystem SS join ETL.sourcetabledetails STD on SS.sourceid = STD.sourceid
join ETL.SourceDateTransformationDetails SDTD on SDTD.tableid = STD.tableid 
where SS.sourcename = '@{pipeline().parameters.SourceName}'
and STD.isactive = 1
and SDTD.isactive = 1

dependsOn.activity: Get List of Columns for Date Transformation

items.value: @activity('Get List of Columns for Date Transformation').output.value

activities.name: Copy Locations to Blob as CSV

scripts.text:
/*
DECLARE @SourceName VARCHAR(100) = 'Hydronet',
		@DestinationTable VARCHAR(200) = 'Hydronet.Location'
*/
DECLARE @SQL NVARCHAR(MAX) = '
SELECT st.TableId,TargetBlobFilePath AS FolderName, TargetBlobFileName + CASE WHEN st.[File_Name_DateTime_Ind] = 1 THEN ''_'' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),dbo.udf_getLocalDTM(),112) ELSE '''' END + TargetBlobFileNameExt AS FileName, QuoteCharacter, ColumnDelimiter
FROM ETL.SourceTableDetails st
WHERE EXISTS
(
	SELECT *
	FROM ETL.SourceSystem ss
	WHERE st.SourceID = ss.SourceID
	AND ss.SourceName = @SourceName
)
AND AzuresqlTargetTableName = @DestinationTable'

EXEC sp_executesql	@SQL, 
					N'@SourceName VARCHAR(100), @DestinationTable VARCHAR(200)', 
					@SourceName = @SourceName, 
					@DestinationTable = @DestinationTable

dependsOn.activity: Copy Locations to Blob as CSV

scripts.text:
DECLARE @SQL NVARCHAR(MAX) = '
SELECT st.TableID, TargetBlobFilePath AS FolderName, TargetBlobFileName + ''_'' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),dbo.udf_getLocalDTM(),112) + TargetBlobFileNameExt AS FileName, QuoteCharacter, ColumnDelimiter
FROM ETL.SourceTableDetails st
WHERE EXISTS
(
	SELECT *
	FROM ETL.SourceSystem ss
	WHERE st.SourceID = ss.SourceID
	AND ss.SourceName = @SourceName
)
AND AzuresqlTargetTableName = @DestinationTable'

EXEC sp_executesql	@SQL, 
					N'@SourceName VARCHAR(100), @DestinationTable VARCHAR(200)', 
					@SourceName = @SourceName, 
					@DestinationTable = @DestinationTable

sqlReaderQuery.value:
Select 
s.sourceID,
tableID, 
SourceLandingContainer,
concat('networkaccess-datalanding/',SourceTableName) as SourceFilePath,
TargetBlobContainer,
TargetBlobFilePath,
TargetBlobFileName = lower(TargetBlobFileName + '_' + cast(SYSDATETIME() as varchar(100))+ targetBlobFileNameExt ),
ColumnDelimiter,QuoteCharacter
from etl.sourcesystem s
LEFT OUTER JOIN ETL.SourceTableDetails d
ON s.sourceid = d.sourceid 
and d.isactive = 1
where sourcename='@{pipeline().parameters.sourcename}'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT t.TargetBlobFilePath
            ,t.TargetBlobFileName + '-' + cast(convert(date,[dbo].[udf_getLocalDTM](),121) as  
 varchar(10)) +  t.targetBlobFileNameExt AS targetBlobFileName
            ,t.TargetBlobContainer
            ,t.ColumnDelimiter
            ,t.QuoteCharacter
FROM ETL.SourceSystem S  
Inner join ETL.SourceTableDetails T
 ON S.SourceID = T.SourceID
WHERE S.SourceName =  '@{pipeline().parameters.sourcename}'
and lower(SourceTableName)='geospatial_devices'
